content.content: The work on finishing the Endgame Plan and preparing next steps is becoming increasingly organized, and a lot of new ideas and details are being contributed by many different people from across the DAO. To streamline the collaboration further, and to make it as accessible as possible, I’ve created a new Discord server meant for discussing many of the different elements of the Endgame Plan, including the Decentralized Voter Committees, Delegates, Endgame Products and MetaDAOs This will be a place for detailed discussions on how to understand the Endgame Plan and how it can be improved. It’s also a place to look for opportunities in MetaDAOs by finding other people that have aligned ideas and interests. I will be filling out the different channels with various bits and pieces of information that can provide the basis for further discussion, or people can simply pop in and find categories that seem relevant and start asking questions and providing input. Looking forward to engaging with as many of you as possible. Please join and have a look if you want to be a part of designing Makers future:    Discord    Join the Endgame Discord Server! Check out the Endgame community on Discord - hang out with 133 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post has created a new Discord server for discussing the Endgame Plan, which includes various elements such as Decentralized Voter Committees, Delegates, Endgame Products, and MetaDAOs. The server is meant for detailed discussions on how to understand and improve the Endgame Plan, as well as to find opportunities in MetaDAOs by connecting with others who have aligned ideas and interests. The author invites others to join and engage in designing Makers future.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
